dare.1: Do a free-style rap for the next minute.

dare.2: Let another person post a status on your behalf.

dare.3: Hand over your phone to another player who can send a single text saying anything they want to anyone they want.

dare.4: Let the other players go through your phone for one minute.

dare.7: Eat a bite of a banana peel.

dare.8: Do an impression of another player until someone can figure out who it is.

dare.9: Say pickles at the end of every sentence you say until it's your turn again.

dare.10: Imitate a YouTube star until another player guesses who you're portraying.

dare.11: Act like a chicken until your next turn.

dare.12: Talk in a British accent until your next turn.

dare.13: Call a friend, pretend it's their birthday, and sing them Happy Birthday to You.

dare.14: Name a famous person that looks like each player in the room.

dare.15: Show us your best dance moves.

dare.16: Eat a packet of hot sauce straight.

dare.17: Let another person draw a tattoo on your back with a permanent marker.

dare.18: Put on a blindfold and touch the other players' faces until you can figure out who's who.

dare.19: Serenade the person to your right for a full minute.

dare.21: Let the other players redo your hairstyle.

dare.23: Dump out your purse, backpack, or pockets and do a show and tell of what's inside.

dare.24: Let the player to your right redo your makeup.

dare.25: Do a prank call on one of your family members.

dare.26: Let another player create a hat out of toilet paper - and you've got to wear it for the rest of the game.

dare.27: Do a plank for a full minute.

dare.28: Let someone give you a wedgie.

dare.29: Put five cubes in your mouth (you can't chew them, you just have to let them meltï¿½brrr).

dare.31: Draw your favorite movie and have the other person guess it (Pictionary-style).

dare.32: Repeat everything the person to your right says until your next turn.

dare.33: Demonstrate how you style your hair in the mirror (without actually using the mirror).

dare.34: Play air guitar for one minute.

dare.35: Empty a glass of cold water onto your head outside.

dare.36: Lay on the floor and act like a sizzling piece of bacon.

dare.37: In the next ten minutes, find a way to scare another player and make it a surprise.

truth.1: If you could be invisible, what is the first thing you would do?

truth.2: What is a secret you kept from your parents?

truth.3: What is the most embarrassing music you listen to?

truth.4: What is one thing you wish you could change about yourself?

truth.6: Who is the last person you creeped on social media?

truth.7: When was the last time you wet the bed?

truth.8: If a genie granted you three wishes, what would you ask for?

truth.10: Where is the weirdest place you've ever gone to the bathroom?

truth.11: What is the most food you've ever eaten in a single sitting?

truth.12: Which player would survive a zombie apocalypse and which would be the first to go?

truth.13: Reveal all the details of your first kiss.

truth.14: What excuse have you used before to get out plans with a friend?

truth.15: What's the longest you've ever slept?

truth.16: Read the last thing you sent your best friend or significant other out loud.

truth.18: When was the last time you lied?

truth.19: What five things would you bring to a desert island?

truth.20: What's the most embarrassing thing you ever did on a date?

truth.21: What is the craziest pickup line you've ever used?

truth.22: What animal do you think you most look like?

truth.23: How many selfies do you take a day?

truth.24: What is one thing you would stand in line for an hour for?

truth.25: When was the last time you cried?

truth.26: What's the longest time you've ever gone without showering?

truth.27: What's the most embarrassing top-played song on your phone?

truth.28: What was your favorite childhood show?

truth.29: If you could be a fictional character for a day, who would you choose?

truth.31: What's one silly thing you can't live without?

truth.32: What is the weirdest trend you've ever participated in?

truth.33: If you could only listen to one song for the rest of your life, what would you choose?

truth.34: What person do you text the most?

truth.35: Have you ever been fired from a job?

truth.36: What is an instant deal breaker in a potential love interest?

truth.37: If you could only eat one thing for the rest of your life, what would you choose?

truth.38: What is the biggest lie you ever told your parents?

truth.39: What's the worst physical pain you've ever experienced?

truth.40: Which player knows you the best?

truth.41: What's your favorite part of your body?

truth.42: What's the weirdest thing you've ever eaten?

truth.43: Have you ever gone skinny dipping?

truth.44: Tell us about the worst date you've ever been on?

truth.46: What's the strangest dream you've ever had?

truth.47: What are the top three things you look for in a boyfriend/girlfriend?

truth.49: How many stuffed animals do you own?
